We are asking that you come to the school next week and gather your personal belongings from the school. We will be running this process with the following schedule:

Seniors = Monday, April 6th 7:30 am - 5:00 pm.
Juniors = Tuesday April 7th 7:30 am - 5:00 pm.
Sophomores = Wednesday, April 8th 7:30 am -5:00 pm

This process should take no longer than 5 minutes. We will be ensuring that social distancing is in effect and that no more than 10 students are in the building at the same time. Administrative staff will be available to guide the process.

To McCook Senior High Students, Parents and Community,

As things continue to progress with the Covid-19 Pandemic, Our focus at MHS is to ensure the continuity of learning as well as the safety and well being of students. We have been working this week on preparing for e-learning/Online learning in the event of additional school closure..

Our staff is working hard to continue to educate, foster, and nurture learning for all of our students. If we have additional school closing, we will be using several platforms for instruction. These include canvas, google classroom, zoom meetings, you tube, and mccookbison email.

We really need for every student to check their school email account on a regular basis. All of our staff will be available to answer questions and lend support. Some staff have begun to make content available electronically. If you have questions, Please reach out to your teachers via email.

As with all learning, communication is the key to our success. Please stay in contact with your instructors as you work through your learning opportunities.
